about.title: Welcome to Our Book-Sharing Platform!
about.description: Thank you for joining us in enhancing KAIST's reading culture through our new software. This platform aims to broaden your book options beyond the library's offerings, making it easier to find and share reading materials.

errors.SIGN_IN_CANCELLED: You cancelled the sign in process.
errors.SIGN_IN_IN_PROGRESS: Sign in is already in progress. Please, be patient.
errors.SIGN_IN_NOT_SUPPORTED: Sign in is not supported in this device. Please, consider another option.
errors.SIGN_IN_ERROR: There was an error during the sign in process. Please try again later.
errors.SERVER_ERROR: Our server had a little problem. Please try again later.
errors.UNAUTHORIZED: You need to be authenticated to perform this action.
errors.FORBIDDEN: You are not allowed to perform this action.
errors.INVALID_TOKEN: There's something wrong with your data.
errors.INVALID_USER_ID: There's something wrong with your data
errors.INVALID_EMAIL: The email you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid email.
errors.INVALID_NAME: The name you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid name.
errors.INVALID_NICKNAME: The nickname you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid nickname.
errors.INVALID_GENRE: The genre you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid genre.
errors.INVALID_AVATAR: The avatar you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid avatar.
errors.FILE_MISSING: There's something wrong with the file you provided.
errors.INVALID_QUERY: Your query does not seem valid. Please provide a valid query.
errors.INVALID_TITLE: The title you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid title.
errors.INVALID_AUTHOR: The author you provided is invalid. Please provide a valid author.
errors.INVALID_VISIBILITY: You've chosen an invalid visibility option. Please provide a valid visibility option.
errors.INVALID_EXCEPTION: You've chosen someone troublesome. Please provide a valid exception.
errors.INVALID_ID: There's something wrong with the data you are interacting with.
errors.FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: We couldn't upload your file. Please try again later.
errors.USER_NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find the user you are looking for.
